title: Road Z: The Last Drive – v1.152
body:
Road Z: The Last Drive – v1.152


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Driving, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Zombies
Company: Blue Moose Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI3
Original Size: 4.8 GB
Repack Size: 3 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by Parnex)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + NitroFlare + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Road_Z_The_Last_Drive-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-road_z_the_last_drive.iso (5,200,871,424 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.8 to 3 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Drive your way through hordes of zombies in an arcade action, driving and upgrade game genres.

In a world surrounded by zombies. Doctor Lactus puts in your possession a vaccine that can save the world, you must cross the United States by car to bring this vaccine to the laboratory in Washington.

Collect hardware by hitting zombies to upgrade your cars. Upgrade the motor, the fuel tank, the armor, add and upgrade a nitro bottle, a turret and flamethrower. Also, explore the surrounding to loot hardware.

Game Features

  • Play as first or third person view
  • Full car damage system
  • 60 car upgrade levels
  • Explore the surrounding
  • 5 vehicles
